name: Jan
title: jan.ai
shortDescription: Jan is an open-source alternative to ChatGPT that operates entirely offline, ensuring user privacy and data security. It is designed for developers and tech enthusiasts who require a powerful AI without relying on cloud services. Users can download and run models like Llama3 or Gemma directly on their devices, or connect to cloud models when necessary. An example use case is setting up a personal AI server for development purposes.
pros: Supports both local and cloud models
cons: Still under development with potential bugs
Requires technical knowledge to set up
Limited user support compared to commercial products
